DESCRIPTION:
- You can drop 3 cards using this command every 8 mins.
- Use the command "sdn" to drop without any images. Helpful for times when you are low on data or do not want to lag.
EXTRA_GRAB_ALERT: {{author}} *Your extra drop is being used. `{{remaining}}` remains.*
BUY_DROP: You can also vote to buy drops - `sbuy drop`
